name: part_008
file: tmp_【#Myth5years】hololive English -Myth- 5th Anniversary Concert： Fortune Spinner [HT_HUFi8DJ4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope, Takanashi Kiara, and Ninomae Ina'nis perform 'Otonoke' by Creepy Nuts.
Instrumental transition and title card for the new original song 'Fortune Spinner'.
Performance of the new trio original song 'Fortune Spinner'.
MC section where the members celebrate their first trio original song.

subtitles.english: Stacking it up, tappa tappa

subtitles.english: Waiting for 4:44

subtitles.english: Day and night, the wind

subtitles.english: Didn't care, waited, the extra edition

subtitles.english: If you lent your voice, then literally good job

subtitles.english: After getting tired of sleeping, I waited for you

subtitles.english: When the octopus and cheek overlap

subtitles.english: When our eyes meet

subtitles.english: Heart, body, head, somehow pulsing

subtitles.english: If wings were to grow on my back now

subtitles.english: Farewell to the darkness

subtitles.english: Flying off to the beyond
